constantValues: A Salutation represents the way a constituent wishes to be addressed, depending on the source, purpose and content of a of communication.  Salutations may or may not be auto-created by workflow.

definitions.description: A Salutation represents the way a constituent wishes to be addressed, depending on the source, purpose and content of a of communication.  Salutations may or may not be auto-created by workflow.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Salutation' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Salutation

members.description: Reason for the status of the Salutation

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Salutation' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: addressLabelLine1

constantValues:
The first line of the address label when printing an envelope
>Mr John Smith
Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.description:
The first line of the address label when printing an envelope
>Mr John Smith
Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.name: addressLabelLine2

constantValues:
This is the 2nd line of the envelope usually the 2nd person in the household if applicable
Mr John Smith
>Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.description:
This is the 2nd line of the envelope usually the 2nd person in the household if applicable
Mr John Smith
>Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.name: addressLabelLine3

constantValues:
This is the 3rd line of the address which could be an Organization name or a C/O
Mr John Smith
Mrs Wilma Smith c/o Anytown Company
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.description:
This is the 3rd line of the address which could be an Organization name or a C/O
Mr John Smith
Mrs Wilma Smith c/o Anytown Company
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: communicationMethod

constantValues: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted via the indicated communication channel

members.description: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted via the indicated communication channel

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'msnfpCommunicationMethod_display' is added to the 'Salutation' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'msnfpCommunicationMethod'
addSupportingAttribute.name: communicationMethod_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: constituentType

constantValues: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted in their capacity as the indicated ConstituentType

members.description: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted in their capacity as the indicated ConstituentType

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'msnfpConstituentType_display' is added to the 'Salutation' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'msnfpConstituentType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: constituentType_display

members.name: insideSalutation

constantValues: This is the information that appears after the word Dear on the letter sent to the donor.

members.description: This is the information that appears after the word Dear on the letter sent to the donor.

members.name: isPreferred

constantValues: Indicates that this Salutation may be applied by business logic when matches on other selection criteria (Comm. method, Account, Constituent Type) are not found.

members.description: Indicates that this Salutation may be applied by business logic when matches on other selection criteria (Comm. method, Account, Constituent Type) are not found.

members.name: onBehalfOfAccount

constantValues: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted in the capacity of their role on the indicated Account.

members.description: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted in the capacity of their role on the indicated Account.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: salutationCustomerId
foreignKeyAttribute.description: The customer account or contact for Salutation

selectedTypeAttribute.name: salutationCustomerIdType
selectedTypeAttribute.description: The type of customer, either Account or Contact.

members.name: type

constantValues: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted for the indicated category of mailing or acknowledgement.
